segments.text: Peter , have you finished your English composition ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . But I ’ m working on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Class starts in twenty minutes . You have to turn it in at the beginning of class today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think you can finish it on time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . I ’ ll get it done very soon . I ’ m almost finished .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it would be a lot easier to finish if you stopped talking to me .
segments.speaker: S2
